info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 4:30AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Rapides, northwestern Jefferson Davis, Beauregard, northern Calcasieu, southeastern Vernon and western Allen Parishes through 500 AM CST... At 430 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of De Ridder to near Oretta. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... De Ridder, Elizabeth, Reeves, Dry Creek, Singer, Moss Bluff, Sugartown, De Quincy, Ragley, Pitkin, Mittie, Fort Polk, Grant, Topsy, Gillis, Oretta, Longville, Buhler, Harmony and Fullerton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
